mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wishlist(productNum, userId, reg_date) VALUES (#{productNum}, #{userId}, SYSDATE)
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM wishlist WHERE productNum = #{productNum} AND userId = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT w.productNum, p.productName, p.price, p.thumbnail, p.discountRate, TO_CHAR(w.reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as regDate FROM wishlist w JOIN product p ON w.productNum = p.productNum WHERE w.userId = #{userId} ORDER BY w.reg_date DESC
